permissions.name: View Unlisted Streamline
permissions.description: Unlisted streams are not discoverable at the streams page, but can only be accessed via direct links and logged in also required. Administrators and Manager can view unlisted streams freely.

permissions.name: Comment on Different Streams
permissions.description: For all users that have logged in, they can comment on different streams but need to follow specific rules listed in different streams. Administrators can comments without restrictions.

permissions.name: Create Unlisted Streams
permissions.description: Create unlisted streams that are not publicly discoverable but accessible via direct link.

permissions.name: Modify Streams Information
permissions.description: Modify the information of streams created by you, including title, description, and tags. Managers and Administrators can modify any stream's information without restrictions.

permissions.name: Stop and Delete Streams Manually
permissions.description: Stop and delete your own streams without stopping the streaming source (stop abnormally). Managers can stop and delete any stream, while Administrators have the highest level of control over all streams.

permissions.name: View Users Profile
permissions.description: You can only view your own profile information. Administrators can view all user profiles without restrictions.

permissions.name: Modify Account Information
permissions.description: Modify your own account information such as username, email, and profile settings. Administrators can modify other users' account information.

permissions.name: Modify Account Password
permissions.description: Only you can modify your own account password. Administrators does not have the permission to modify other users' passwords for any reasons.

permissions.name: Delete Account
permissions.description: Delete your own account and all associated data. Only Administrators can delete other users' accounts and manage account removals across the platform.

permissions.name: View System Information and Metrics
permissions.description: View system information and metrics related to streams, users, and platform performance.
